messageTravelAdvisory.advisoryInfo:
Based on the weather conditions in the Mid-Atlantic and Northeast, our scheduled service on Friday, February 21, may be disrupted (delayed, diverted, and/or cancelled flights).

Customers holding reservations for travel to/from/through the following cities after 2:00 p.m. ET through the close of business on February 21 are eligible to reschedule their flights in accordance with our accommodation procedures:

  • Baltimore/Washington (BWI)
  • Boston (BOS)
  • Hartford (BDL)
  • Long Island/Islip (ISP)
  • Newark (EWR)
  • New York LaGuardia (LGA)
  • Philadelphia (PHL)
  • Providence (PVD)
  • Washington Dulles (IAD)
  • Washington Reagan National (DCA)

Please rebook your travel on Southwest.com or our mobile app.

Customers who did not purchase a ticket via Southwest.com or our mobile app can call 1-800-435-9792 to speak with a Customer Representative.

For specific flight information, please check flight status information.

Customers holding reservations for a flight that is cancelled may request a refund for an unused ticket/travel itinerary.

stationInfo.stationDetails:
SODA LANGUAGE:
Customers holding reservations to/from Hartford (BDL) on Monday, March 23 thru the close of business Wednesday, March 25, wanting to alter their travel plans may rebook in the original class of service or travel standby (within 14 days of their original date of travel between the original city-pairs and in accordance with our accommodation procedures) without paying any additional charge.
RULE 85 LANGUAGE:
Additionally, Customers holding reservations for a flight that is cancelled to/from Hartford (BDL) may request a refund for an unused ticket/travel itinerary.
SODA ONLINE REBOOK LANGUAGE:
Customers who purchased their itinerary via Southwest.com or our mobile app are eligible to reschedule their travel plans online or from their mobile device. All other ticketed Customers should call our toll-free number 1 (800) 435-9792 for assistance.

SODA LANGUAGE:
Customers holding reservations to/from Hartford (BDL) on Monday, March 23 thru the close of business Wednesday, March 25, wanting to alter their travel plans may rebook in the original class of service or travel standby (within 14 days of their original date of travel between the original city-pairs and in accordance with our accommodation procedures) without paying any additional charge.
RULE 85 LANGUAGE:
Additionally, Customers holding reservations for a flight that is cancelled to/from Hartford (BDL) may request a refund for an unused ticket/travel itinerary.
SODA ONLINE REBOOK LANGUAGE:
Customers who purchased their itinerary via Southwest.com or our mobile app are eligible to reschedule their travel plans online or from their mobile device. All other ticketed Customers should call our toll-free number 1 (800) 435-9792 for assistance.
